topic.title: YEAR AND MONTH OF LAST CARE PROFESSIONAL HIV COMMUNICATION
topic.shortdesc: YEAR AND MONTH OF LAST CARE PROFESSIONAL HIV COMMUNICATION is the year and month of the last communication between the Health Care Provider and the GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTITIONER, where the PATIENT CONSENT OBTAINED INDICATOR FOR CARE PROFESSIONAL CONTACT is National Code 'Yes - the PATIENT has consented for their GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTITIONER to be contacted about their care'.
